post.title: international texting in virgin mobile
post.content: i saw this on vm's webiste (http://www.virginmobileusa.com/mobil...text-messaging) international text send and receive text messages with people on select carriers in over 170 countries worldwide. to send an international text, enter 011 + the country code + the mobile number. simple as that. available on: all virgin mobile phones does anyone know what are those 170 countries and what are those select carriers ?
